ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately regenerate <unbreak>30%</unbreak> Energy for all allies. In the next battle, increase ATK by <unbreak>100</unbreak> and DMG dealt by <unbreak>35%</unbreak>. Upon entering battle, there's a <unbreak>10%</unbreak> base chance to enter the Strong Reverberation state, lasting for 1 turn.
ItemBGDesc: It's widely known that putting powerful things together makes them even more powerful. Like Granny Chen's Tofu, SoulGlad, and Izumo Miso â€” each delicious on its own.
